events.title: Free Health Camp 2024
events.description: Comprehensive health checkup camp organized for underprivileged communities in rural areas. Services include blood pressure monitoring, diabetes screening, and general health consultation.

events.title: Medical Awareness Drive
events.description: Educational program focused on preventive healthcare measures, nutrition awareness, and hygiene practices for school children and community members.

events.title: Dhanvantari Jayanti Celebration
events.description: Annual celebration of Lord Dhanvantari's birth anniversary with special prayers, cultural programs, and distribution of ayurvedic medicines to devotees.

events.title: Community Vaccination Drive
events.description: Organized vaccination camp in collaboration with local health authorities to ensure immunization coverage for children and adults in the community.
